languages.text: "Отступники, что предпочли опорочить честь своих семей. Предатели, соблазненные Последним восходом. Лишь кровь смоет память о позоре их предательства".
languages.translation_comment: стейт 2 — для игроков с поздними сейвами (2 + глава)
стейт 2 — для игроков с поздними сейвами (2 + глава)

languages.text: "Apostates led astray by the Final Dawn. These traitors chose to tarnish the honour of their families. Only their blood can wash away the shameful memory of their betrayal."
languages.original_text: "Отступники, что предпочли опорочить честь своих семей. Предатели, соблазненные Последним восходом. Лишь кровь смоет память о позоре их предательства".

traits.locale_text: "Apostates who chose to tarnish the honour of their families. Traitors led astray by the Final Dawn. Only blood can wash away the shameful memory of their betrayal."
"Apostates who chose to tarnish the honour of their families. Traitors led astray by the Final Dawn. Only blood can wash away the shameful memory of their betrayal."

"Apostates led astray by the Final Dawn. These traitors chose to tarnish the honour of their families. Only their blood can wash away the shameful memory of their betrayal."

languages.text: « Ces apostats ont été dupés par l'Aube finale. Ils ont terni l'honneur de leur famille. Seul leur sang peut laver le souvenir honteux de leur trahison. »
languages.original_text: "Apostates led astray by the Final Dawn. These traitors chose to tarnish the honour of their families. Only their blood can wash away the shameful memory of their betrayal."

traits.locale_text: « Ces apostats ont été dupés par l'Aube finale. Ils ont terni l'honneur de leur famille. Seul leur sang peut laver le souvenir honteux de leur trahison. »

languages.text: «Apóstatas descarriados por el Amanecer Final. Estos traidores decidieron mancillar el honor de sus familias. Solo su sangre puede borrar el vergonzoso recuerdo de su traición».
languages.original_text: "Apostates led astray by the Final Dawn. These traitors chose to tarnish the honour of their families. Only their blood can wash away the shameful memory of their betrayal."

traits.locale_text: «Apóstatas descarriados por el Amanecer Final. Estos traidores decidieron mancillar el honor de sus familias. Solo su sangre puede borrar el vergonzoso recuerdo de su traición».

languages.text: “他们是被终末黎明诱入歧途的叛教者。这些叛徒玷污了他们家族的荣耀，只有他们的鲜血才能洗刷背叛的耻辱记忆。”
languages.original_text: "Apostates led astray by the Final Dawn. These traitors chose to tarnish the honour of their families. Only their blood can wash away the shameful memory of their betrayal."

traits.locale_text: “他们是被终末黎明诱入歧途的叛教者。这些叛徒玷污了他们家族的荣耀，只有他们的鲜血才能洗刷背叛的耻辱记忆。”

languages.text: 「『最後の夜明け』に導かれた背教者たちだ。裏切り者どもは一族の名誉を汚すことを選んだ。彼らの血だけが、その裏切りの恥ずべき記憶を洗い流すことができる」
languages.original_text: "Apostates led astray by the Final Dawn. These traitors chose to tarnish the honour of their families. Only their blood can wash away the shameful memory of their betrayal."

traits.locale_text: 「『最後の夜明け』に導かれた背教者たちだ。裏切り者どもは一族の名誉を汚すことを選んだ。彼らの血だけが、その裏切りの恥ずべき記憶を洗い流すことができる」

languages.text: "Apostaten, die von der Letzten Dämmerung auf den falschen Weg geführt wurden. Diese Verräter haben entschieden, die Ehre ihrer Familien zu besudeln. Nur ihr Blut kann die schändliche Erinnerung an ihren Verrat fortwaschen."
languages.original_text: "Apostates led astray by the Final Dawn. These traitors chose to tarnish the honour of their families. Only their blood can wash away the shameful memory of their betrayal."

traits.locale_text: "Apostaten, die von der Letzten Dämmerung auf den falschen Weg geführt wurden. Diese Verräter haben entschieden, die Ehre ihrer Familien zu besudeln. Nur ihr Blut kann die schändliche Erinnerung an ihren Verrat fortwaschen."

languages.original_text: "Apostates led astray by the Final Dawn. These traitors chose to tarnish the honour of their families. Only their blood can wash away the shameful memory of their betrayal."

languages.text: "Nihai Şafak'ın yoldan çıkardığı mürtetler. Bu hainler, ailelerinin şerefine leke sürmeyi tercih etmiş. Bu ihanetin utancı ancak kanla temizlenir."
languages.original_text: "Apostates led astray by the Final Dawn. These traitors chose to tarnish the honour of their families. Only their blood can wash away the shameful memory of their betrayal."
